description:
Pulling no Punches is a classic beatâ€™em up game with frame-by-frame animations, where players will try to survive a fictional pandemic in a city filled with madness and denial. The game includes 4 playable characters with unique unlockable moves, extremely detailed environments and local co-op multiplayer for up to 4 players.

A BUNCH OF COOL STUFF:
 
- 4 Co-op Local Multiplayer!
- 4 Characters with unique Unlockables and Moves!
- Use everything at your disposal to destroy your enemies: a wide variety of punches, kicks, grabs and headbutts!
- Handmade art painfully animated frame by frame!
name: Pulling no Punches
